name: Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Handy v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of April, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

849 A.2d 229
Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
